timeline.bodyText: this is not an id at will not be unique if many orders get filled at the same time - its better to leave id as null then to have a not unique id
timeline.author: walec51

timeline.bodyText:
is this actually something they are returning?
in the documentation I can only see:  send，pending，success，cancel
timeline.author: walec51

replies.bodyText:
"status": "0000" is the top level (did the rest call work)
"order_status": "Completed" is see on orderDetails
send，pending，success，cancel i dont see in docs
it is clear that the code we had was written for an API that changed drastically, but remained on the same endpoints
replies.author: mdvx

timeline.message: Bithumb API Changes Fixes #3 - Transactions vs UserTransactions - OrderDetails - updated UnitTests
Missed unit test change

timeline.bodyText: are you sure that old transactions don't have spaces and minus sign?
timeline.author: walec51

replies.bodyText: good point, check moved to BithumbUserTransaction()
replies.author: mdvx

timeline.bodyText:
to me this looks worse then the previous code
if BithumbResponse changes then a lot of classes will get affected because they now must override its constructor
then name of the class  its self suggests that details for one order will be returned
timeline.author: walec51

timeline.bodyText:
if this does not have the data field then it should not extend from BithumbResponse
besides it this now does not return a list of trades then there is no sense in calling it a Trade response
timeline.author: walec51

replies.bodyText:
This is only used to return the orderId of newly placed orders, so it is the REST response to place, marketBuy, marketsell.
I have removed dependency on BithumbResponse
replies.author: mdvx

timeline.bodyText:
silent errors are pure evil
use Jackson annotations to parse make it parse the date in the desired format
timeline.author: walec51

timeline.bodyText: those inner classes make reading all of this much worse
timeline.author: walec51

timeline.bodyText:
silent errors are pure evil
IOException  should be thrown out
timeline.author: walec51
